page.title: 09FIFTY YEARS AGO
page.content: An interview with Mrs. Smith. a) Where did you live as a child? I lived at levelmare lane which is just off Fontwell Avenue.I had two miles to walk to school every day down that old muddy lane at Northfields before I reached Nyton road then on down Westergate Street.I used to do that when I was 5 with my friends. b) How much has the village changed since you were little? Today there are many more houses than when I was a girl.Westergate Street didn't have any roads leading off,only one little muddy lane which was Ivy lane leading to a few cottages.All the other roads have been built in more recent times. The playing field (The old recreation ground)which is now Barnetts field.It had two swings,a seesaw, and a cricket & Football pitch .
